attributes.action: Force advertising companies to include same sex couples in their advertisements
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All if not nearly all advertisements, whether on tv, or magazines etc show same sex couples.  Either buying a home together, visiting a bank for a loan, out having a meal, going on holiday or buying a sofa.  

This gives out negative signs that only straight people do such things.  This clearly needs looking into to allow everyone to see that gay couples do all the same mundane things that the straights do (like shopping in tesso or buying a sofa.

Please stop ignoring our lives.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
